H0.text: World globe is the type of model that best shows the location of underwater ocean ridges.

H1.text: A satellite map best shows the location of underwater ocean ridges.

H2.text: Topographic maps best show the location of underwater ocean ridges.

H3.text: A nautical chart is the type of model that best shows the location of underwater ocean ridges.

A4.text: Depth contour lines show the shape of underwater relief.

A5.text: All depths on charts is measured with respect to a datum/reference level.
